text: In factories sponsored by the London new town development corporations the proportion of female employees expressed as a percentage of all employees varies from 23 per cent in Welwyn Garden City and 24 per cent in Hemel Hempstead to 35 per cent in Basildon and 55 per cent in Hatfield with an average of about 30 per cent - rather less than in the country as a whole.
handwritten_text: In factories sponsored by the London new town development corporations the proportion of female employees expressed as a percentage of all employees varies from 23 per cent in Welwyn Garden City and 24 per cent in Hemel Hempstead to 35 per cent in Basildon and 55 per cent in Hatfield with an average of about 30 per cent - rather less than in the country as a whole.
